DataElement.preferredName: Treatment Step Intervention or Procedure Complete Follow Study Protocol Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine whether or not an intervention or procedure during a specific treatment step was completed per the formal plan of an experiment or research activity protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Treatment Step Intervention or Procedure Complete Follow Study Protocol
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A specific stage of progression through a sequential treatment protocol._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._Adhere to or practice._The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A specific stage of progression through a sequential treatment protocol.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Concepts.definition: A specific stage of progression through a sequential treatment protocol.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Property.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:Adhere to or practice.:The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
